Source code for GangOfFour.facade


[docs]
class SubsystemA:


[docs]
    def method1(self):
        print("SubsystemA Method1")





[docs]
    def method2(self):
        print("SubsystemA Method2")








[docs]
class SubsystemB:


[docs]
    def method1(self):
        print("SubsystemB Method1")





[docs]
    def method2(self):
        print("SubsystemB Method2")








[docs]
class Facade:
    def __init__(self):
        self._subsystem_A = SubsystemA()
        self._subsystem_B = SubsystemB()



[docs]
    def method(self):
        self._subsystem_A.method1()
        self._subsystem_A.method2()

        self._subsystem_B.method1()
        self._subsystem_B.method2()








[docs]
def main():
    facade = Facade()
    facade.method()




if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
